Author: Moderator
Message: Hello RandomGenderNeutralN.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Yes, I do understand.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Hi there, how are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright. What about you?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Me as well, mind if I ask you some pretty random questions to see if you are the bot?

Author: Andrew
Message: As long as they are still intelligible for a human!

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Is the following word spelled correct? 'Κnight'

Author: Andrew
Message: If you indeed want to talk about a guy in shining armor, yes.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Well, you kind of passed the first test, a Bot does not know that the capital greek Kappa looks exactly like the capital letter 'K' in most stylesets, so yeah, I meant the guy in shining armor. Nice.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yay, I'm not a bot.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: At least you don't look like one for now. Okay, next one. I will give you pairs of things that have a very obvious similarity. You will then find a fitting word to complete the last pair, ready?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm horrible at this, but go ahead.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: (Sky,Water) (Leaf,Grass) (Paper,The house the president works in) (sand,____)

Author: Andrew
Message: Yup. I suck at this. Is it desert?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Well, why would it be desert?

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh wait. Sky, water, that's blue, leaf, grass, that's green, paper, the house, that's white, for sand, I'd just need something yellow. So sure desert.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Well, you are able to understand abstract relationships between words, I am pretty sure by now that you are a human or the best bot I ever had the joy to chat with. Well Andrew, can we chat about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: Only if we can chat about you too! What do you want to know?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Well, sure, lets just take turns in asking questions. Where are you from? don't need to be the town, just general region or so.

Author: Andrew
Message: I live in London, Ontario right now. You?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: I am in Germany. I heard a lot about ontario, do you often pet the wild elephants there?

Author: Andrew
Message: The pink ones yes! How often do you have beer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: The Human

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin, then you'll have 15 minutes again after your answer.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Hi there, nice to meet you.

Author: Andrew
Message: Nice to meet you too. How are you doing?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Fine, thanks! Mind if I ask some questions?

Author: Andrew
Message: Sure, I'm pretty sure that's why we're talking!

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Is the following word spelled correctly? 'Κnight'

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm pretty sure that's right if you meant dragons food.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: At least you don't look like one for now. Okay, next one. I will give you pairs of things that have a very obvious similarity. You will then find a fitting word to complete the last pair, ready?

Author: Andrew
Message: I don't think I'm quite good at that. But shoot!

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: (Sky,Water) (Leaf,Grass) (Paper,The house the president works in) (sand,____)

Author: Andrew
Message: Mmm. Sun?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Why would it be sun?

Author: Andrew
Message: It seems to be fitting.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Can you name the thing your answear has in common with the prompt word?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm actually a bit confused right now. Wasn't it the good answer?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: There were many good answears, I am more interested in your abillity to defend your choice or give a reasoning for it.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh I see. It just felt right honestly.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: so you do not see what these have in common? look at the third pair, it kind of gives it away as an example of the property is in the name of the structre.

Author: Andrew
Message: I honestly don't. The first two pairs I think I see, but the rest not so much.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: I used a descriptio of a building, in the third pair, do you know the name of the building I am refering to?

Author: Andrew
Message: Trump tower?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: that is where he lives, but where is his famous office in? I asked for where he works to rule out this option.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh I see. The white house then.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: okay, what do the white house have in common with paper?

Author: Andrew
Message: They are both white. And if you're not careful enough they'll find a way to cut you.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: Well you are funny, but honestly, I do believe that you are the Bot by now.

Author: Andrew
Message: My feelings are hurt to be honest.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: The Human

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how comfident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have comments you'd like to share, you can do so now. Otherwise you can close this window.

Author: RandomGenderNeutralName
Message: You guys wrote a awesome bot, I believe I got it right but you mimic human behaviour pretty well!
